LanguageData.GloomyDeco_TrashCan.label: trash can
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_TrashCan.description:
It's a trash can that you can throw away trash.

Block up to 10 trash falling around. (same room)
If more than 8 trash, your colonist will clean.
If more than 10 trash, cleanliness and beauty will be reduced.
